mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Russell, Jonathan, 1771-1832
mdRecord.dcterms:description: At request of citizens of state is transmitting memorial relative to removal of loan office from here to New Port; encloses paper giving data from which estimation of relative amount of funded stock and number of stockholders has been made. [Enclosure]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1804 June 29, Providence, [Rhode Island] to Thomas Jefferson, n.p.
